title: Cow wreaks havoc on Hume Highway
content:
A cow on the loose caused mayhem for motorists in the southbound lanes of the Hume Highway near Narellan Road last night. 

Around 10 o'clock Police were called with the assistance of the RSPCA, Campbelltown Council and RMS. 

The animal was safely removed and taken to a nearby farm about two and a half hours later.
